description: Try our easy to follow Turkey Burger & Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Turkey Burger & Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 900g Birds Eye Golden Crunch Straight Cut Chips In Batter

recipeInstructions.text: Burger Recipe :Combine all in bowl, mix together
Prepare Patties to 1cm thickness, cook for approx. 8mins flipping once on medium heat.
Set patties aside and cook the onion in 10g of butter for approximately 5 minutes on high heat
Cut the rolls in half and toast roll using grill for 1 -2 minutes or until liking
Butter both sides of the roll
Add tomato or bbq sauce to the bottom slice of the bread
Add 1 burger patty, onion and slices of tomato
Top with lettuce and add the top half of the roll
Repeat steps 4-8 to make remaining burgers
Chips Recipe: Method 1 (Oven) : Preheat Oven (220°C Fan Forced, 230°C Conventional Oven)
Place frozen chips on an oven tray in a SINGLE LAYER. This will ensure the chips get maximum CRUNCH. So basically.DON’T STACK ‘EM!
Cook for 20 - 25 minutes or until golden brown and crunchy. Serve immediately
Method 2 (Air Fry): Set air fryer to 180°C (or choose the chip setting if your unit is pre-programmed).
Place half bag of frozen chips into the air fryer basket.
Cook for 15 - 20 minutes or until golden brown and crunchy, SHAKE BASKET HALF WAY THROUGH COOKING.
Method 3 (Air Fry) : Preheat vegetable oil in deep fryer to 180°C.
Deep fry frozen chips for 3 1/2 - 4 minutes or until golden brown and crunchy.
